Oversee full P&L of $50M and approximately 150 employees for global leader of inline process control solutions. Manage, assess, and optimize operational productivity of multiple international sites. Increase shareholder value by growing market presence and increasing transparency in business decisions. Reduce business’s exposure to risk factors via comprehensive risk analysis and mitigation plan.
• Played essential role in business development, effecting long-term strategy for 10% YOY profit growth.
• Identified and replaced  CANDIDATE
Roger Ingemey Kamp-Lintfort
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location: UAE
QUALIFICATIONS
PhD, Physical Chemistry - University of Duisburg-Essen
CAREER SUMMARY
optek-Danulat GmbH, Essen, Germany/Shanghai, China/Singapore/Wisconsin, USA
4/2023 – Present
COO/Managing Director
Oversee full P&L of $50M and approximately 150 employees for global leader of inline process control solutions. Manage, assess, and optimize operational productivity of multiple international sites. Increase shareholder value by growing market presence and increasing transparency in business decisions. Reduce business’s exposure to risk factors via comprehensive risk analysis and mitigation plan.
• Played essential role in business development, effecting long-term strategy for 10% YOY profit growth.
• Identified and replaced underperforming processes with streamlined, robust strategies that improved efficiency by
70% while elevating customer satisfaction.
• Designed and implemented holistic leadership and staff-development program that increased employee
engagement and overall efficiency.
Circor, Cologne, Germany/Stuttgart, Germany/Coimbatore, India
9/2017 – 3/2023
Vice President Power and Process/Managing Director
Reported directly to CEO in managing full P&L of $100M and more than 400 employees in three locations for international manufacturer of flow- and motion-control products. Developed and launched rolling five-year strategic plan for increased visibility, shareholder value, and profit growth. Emphasized health and safety as well as efficiency via process optimization.
• Revitalized four stagnating brands, resulting in 8% and 11% YOY top-line growth above intrinsic market growth.
• Realized significant improvements in key metrics: 100% increase in AOI within two years, 100% increase of free
cash flow, 90% reduction of time-to-quote for spare parts orders, and 50% reduction of safety incidents.
• Spearheaded and introduced corporation-wide digitization program.
• Led initiative for change in corporate culture with open communication program across all levels, resulting in
improved employee engagement and reduced turnover.
ALIAXIS/Friatec AG, Mannheim, Germany
2/2015 – 8/2017
Vice President DACH Region/Vice President Electrofusion
Oversaw full P&L of €215M for leading manufacturer and distributor of plastic pipes and fittings for fluid handling with global workforce of more than 16,000. Increased shareholder value by reducing operating costs while improving profit margins, cash flow, and topline growth. Managed mergers and acquisitions pipeline.
• Initiated company turnaround via major improvements in key financial metrics, including 32% EBIT growth after 10 years of decline and €3M reduction in working capital.
• Streamlined operational processes to increase OTIF from 40% to 80% and reduce MOL (maintenance of line) by 50% in research and development.
• Aligned multiple brands and legal entities into integrated and cohesive organizational structure.
Summary
Dynamic business leader with proven history of success overseeing complex organizational transitions while maintaining top- and bottom-line growth and aligning company mission across teams. Effective manager of processes and people with keen ability to identify and optimize underperforming initiatives and inspire staff to high levels of performance. Proficient in Kaizen principles for ongoing process improvement; creates incentive programs to recognize employee innovation and achievement. Broad range of experience in global industries including chemical, pharmaceutical, renewable-energy, machine building and utilities. Fluent in German (native tongue) and English with basic proficiency in French.
Areas of Expertise
• Top- and Bottom-Line Growth
• Budget & Cash Management
• Process Improvement
• Change Management
Accomplishments
• Lean Principles
• Business Strategy
• Risk Assessment/Mitigation • Team Leadership
• International Sales
• Employee Engagement
• Training/Mentoring
• Communication
• Thrives in international business; comfortable leading teams large and small in multiple locations and of diverse backgrounds.
• Change management expert: managed business strategies and staff through two acquis

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
